name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Woodrow BALLARD, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Woodrow BALLARD, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of April, 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby granted, to consider the following issue:
Whether 75 Pa.C.S. 1547(h) or the Pennsylvania Constitution’s due process clause grants Ballard the right to independently examine the blood samples he gave to the police?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
872 A.2d 1125
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Woodrow BALLARD, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 13, 2005.
